title: Mophie brings MagSafe to a foldable iPhone travel stand
content:
Mophie continues to expand its collection of MagSafe-compatible accessories for iPhone users. Following the introduction of the 3-in-1 travel charger last month, Mophie has now taken the wraps off of a new Portable Magnetic Stand that features MagSafe compatibility and a travel-friendly design, but there’s one limitation…

more…
